entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow. Temperature rising to plus 3 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning after midnight. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 overnight. Temperature rising to plus 3 by morning. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Rain at times heavy or snow. High 12.
entry.summary: Snow changing to rain at times heavy in the morning and ending late in the afternoon then cloudy. Rainfall amount 30 to 40 mm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 50 gusting to 90 in the morning then becoming southwest 40 gusting to 70 in the afternoon. High 12. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of showers. Low minus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of showers in the evening. Showers beginning near midnight and ending overnight. Amount 2 to 4 mm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Wednesday 25 January 2023
